name: A Story About My Day
description:
Hello!

This is my first game I'm submitting. I made this game for the 2021 1-Bit Jam.

Controls :

Left Click to click on the button.

Esc to quit the game.

Notes:

The web version should be identical to the downloadable Windows version, except that the resolution is 2x smaller on the web version.

Also, when we click to end the story, it is intentional that the game waits a bit and then quits. Although it's probably not the best design decision on my part ;)
